revised_title: Surface Corrections to Landau Diamagnetism and de Haas-van Alphen Effect
tldr: This article calculates the surface corrections to the Landau diamagnetism and the de Haas-van Alphen effect in large systems of electrons. The author investigates two systems, a cylinder and a rectangular box, and compares the values of the coefficients and to verify the results. The study provides insights into the magnetic properties of metals and the behavior of electrons in magnetic fields.
